overview:
Long time Silicon Valley product manager who focuses on investigating customer needs and how those translate best into products and businesses that deliver customer value, build customer loyalty and make money.

Uses a multifaceted approach to product and business creation that blends user needs, opportunity analysis, product strategy, technology understanding, marketing and business perspectives into a coherent end-to-end offering for software and hardware products. Extensive experience in sales, product management, pricing, forecasting, market research, public relations, partner management, developer marketing and marquee account management for software and hardware products.
